stories.Title: SREday in London
stories.Description: London awaits you on September 14-15! Immerse in 2 days of innovation with over 50+ talks from SRE experts. Hurry, early bird tickets won't last!
stories.Tweet: SREday in London 📦 London awaits you on September 14-15! Immerse in 2 days of innovation with over 50+ talks from SRE experts. Hurry, early bird tickets won't last! #SRE https://sreday.com/?unpack

stories.Title: Claude Instant 1.2 is here!
stories.Description: Anthropic's innovation journey continues with Claude Instant's latest version. Drawing on Claude 2's capabilities, this release displays notable progress in math, coding, reasoning, and safety.
stories.Tweet: Claude Instant 1.2 is here! 📦 Anthropic's innovation journey continues with Claude Instant's latest version. Drawing on Claude 2's capabilities, this release displays notable progress in math, coding, reasoning, and safety. #anthropic https://techcrunch.com/2023/08/09/anthropic-launches-improved-version-of-its-entry-level-llm/

stories.Title: Salesforce introduces Einstein Studio
stories.Description: This user-friendly tool, part of the Data Cloud service, brings tailored solutions for businesses to train, deploy, and monitor AI creations efficiently.
stories.Tweet: Salesforce introduces Einstein Studio 📦 This user-friendly tool, part of the Data Cloud service, brings tailored solutions for businesses to train, deploy, and monitor AI creations efficiently. #salesforce https://www.marktechpost.com/2023/08/09/salesforce-releases-einstein-studio-and-the-ability-to-bring-your-own-model-byom/

stories.Title: Amazon's Project Kuiper adapts and evolves
stories.Description: FCC deadlines and launch delays lead to a change in strategy. Now, an Atlas V rocket will launch the prototype satellites this fall.
stories.Tweet: Amazon's Project Kuiper adapts and evolves 📦 FCC deadlines and launch delays lead to a change in strategy. Now, an Atlas V rocket will launch the prototype satellites this fall. #amazon https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/amazon-will-now-launch-project-kuiper-satellites-on-atlas-v

stories.Title: Virgin Galactic achieves another milestone!
stories.Description: Private space travel becomes a reality as Galactic 02 lifts off from Spaceport America. Featuring private-paying tourists Jon Goodwin, Keisha Schahaff, and Anastatia Mayers.
stories.Tweet: Virgin Galactic achieves another milestone!  📦 Private space travel becomes a reality as Galactic 02 lifts off from Spaceport America. Featuring private-paying tourists Jon Goodwin, Keisha Schahaff, and Anastatia Mayers. #virgingalactic https://www.cnbc.com/2023/08/10/watch-livestream-virgin-galactic-launches-galactic-02-spaceflight.html

stories.Title: Russia returns to the moon
stories.Description: Today's historic launch of the Luna 25 moon lander marks the nation's reentry into lunar exploration after a half-century.
stories.Tweet: Russia returns to the moon 📦 Today's historic launch of the Luna 25 moon lander marks the nation's reentry into lunar exploration after a half-century. #rocketscience https://www.space.com/russia-luna-25-moon-lander-launch-webcast

stories.Title: The revelations of Curiosity on Mars
stories.Description: Researchers are astonished by the presence of well-preserved mud cracks, hinting at past cycles of wet and dry conditions that could have nurtured microbial life on the red planet.
stories.Tweet: The revelations of Curiosity on Mars 📦 Researchers are astonished by the presence of well-preserved mud cracks, hinting at past cycles of wet and dry conditions that could have nurtured microbial life on the red planet. #NASA https://www.jpl.nasa.gov/news/cracks-in-ancient-martian-mud-surprise-nasas-curiosity-rover-team

stories.Title: Batman's presence required
stories.Description: A colossal question mark, captured by the James Webb Space Telescope, surprised stargazers. Could it be the cosmic Riddler's mischief? No, it's simply a pair of galaxies merging.
stories.Tweet: Batman's presence required 📦 A colossal question mark, captured by the James Webb Space Telescope, surprised stargazers. Could it be the cosmic Riddler's mischief? No, it's simply a pair of galaxies merging. #NASA https://www.digitaltrends.com/space/cosmic-question-mark-spotted-by-webb-space-telescope/

stories.Title: Cadillac: Defining electric luxury
stories.Description: Cadillac's all-electric Escalade IQ combines engineering, luxury, and innovation in a remarkable fusion. A new chapter for the iconic SUV as it delves into the electric age.
stories.Tweet: Cadillac: Defining electric luxury 📦 Cadillac's all-electric Escalade IQ combines engineering, luxury, and innovation in a remarkable fusion. A new chapter for the iconic SUV as it delves into the electric age. #generalmotors https://electrek.co/2023/08/09/cadillac-unveils-all-electric-escalade-iq-battery-big-range-price-ev/

stories.Title: Hang up carefully
stories.Description: Apple's iOS 17 latest beta brings a significant change: the "End Call" button has moved to a new spot, from the center of your screen to the lower right corner.
stories.Tweet: Hang up carefully 📦 Apple's iOS 17 latest beta brings a significant change: the "End Call" button has moved to a new spot, from the center of your screen to the lower right corner. #apple https://www.cnbc.com/2023/08/08/apple-moves-button-to-hang-up-or-end-call-in-ios-17-beta.html

stories.Title: Sign on the dotted line!
stories.Description: Native eSignature support is coming to Google Docs and Drive. Beta access will soon open up for Workspace individual subscribers, while the rest of us will need to exercise patience.
stories.Tweet: Sign on the dotted line! 📦 Native eSignature support is coming to Google Docs and Drive. Beta access will soon open up for Workspace individual subscribers, while the rest of us will need to exercise patience. #google https://www.theverge.com/2023/8/10/23826970/google-docs-drive-esignature-support-beta

title: Virgin Galactic lifts off, Anthropic unveils Claude Instant 1.2, Apple's phone app gets revamped
description: The dream of space travel becomes a reality for a former Olympian and mother-daughter duo. Who knows, maybe that dream's in the cards for me too in a few years! Anthropic wants to get better, faster, and safer with the newly released Claude Instant 1.2. Meanwhile, iOS 17 latest beta just dropped a sneaky little change that's totally gonna mess with my calls for at least a few months.
